name: Bob Ross Saves the World
description:
Bob Ross is featured in this amazing action arcade game! Travel through time and beat all supreme leaders! If you just cant get enough of the action there is an endless mode for all you mlg people, great if you want to compete your high score with friends!

Exhilarating music is played throughout the entire game, thanks to AngloSaxophone who allows the usage of his music. You can check him out here through the following links!

Trumpwave:

Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWwcIBhzI9KiXTKqA...

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/trumpwave

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sKald_
